column7: Add Documentation how to use it
column22: I would like to use this package but i have no glue how to use it. For now just a few lines of example code would help a lot.

Currently, the message contents are unserialized with @unserialize()@, which is AFAIK only supported natively by PHP. To make it easier to use the message queue with different platforms, more formats like JSON should be supported. Support for this would require to also store the serialization format/content type with the message, as is supported e.g. by RabbitMQ.
